summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General voluntary interview form (OIG Form III.226/2) used to document warnings and assurances given to an employee being asked to provide information as part of an investigation. The form includes a waiver section for the employee to sign, acknowledging the voluntary nature of the interview. The specific investigation subject appears to be redacted.
keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview form from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General.
The form is used to inform an employee that an interview is voluntary and no disciplinary action will be taken if they choose not to answer questions.
The subject of the investigation is redacted in the text, appearing as '_IQ ~ 0/lane, pailin, aro pidi lute'.
The form includes a waiver for the employee to sign, acknowledging the warnings and that no promises or threats were made.
The form is dated 05/03/21 (May 3, 2021) as its revision date, but the specific interview date and time are not filled in.
